text: Leonid Gomerovich Lazaridi (; born 17 April 1980) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Russian footballers Category:FC Zhemchuzhina Sochi players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Sibir Novosibirsk players Category:Association football defenders Category:FC Rubin Kazan players Category:FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk players
title: Leonid Lazaridi
